mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders ( order_id, ord_seq, ord_proc_seq, claim_id, member_id, order_date, total_amount, status, created_at ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{ordSeq}, #{ordProcSeq}, #{claimId}, #{memberId}, #{orderDate}, #{totalAmount}, #{status, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT order_id, ord_seq, ord_proc_seq, claim_id, member_id, order_date, total_amount, status FROM orders WHERE order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY ord_seq ASC, ord_proc_seq ASC
SELECT order_id, ord_seq, ord_proc_seq, claim_id, member_id, order_date, total_amount, status FROM orders WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY order_date DESC, ord_seq ASC, ord_proc_seq ASC
SELECT order_id, ord_seq, ord_proc_seq, claim_id, member_id, order_date, total_amount, status FROM orders WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND ord_proc_seq = #{ordProcSeq} ORDER BY ord_seq ASC

SELECT DISTINCT o.order_id, o.ord_seq, o.ord_proc_seq, o.claim_id, o.member_id, o.order_date, o.total_amount, o.status FROM orders o LEFT JOIN payment p ON o.order_id = p.order_id WHERE o.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY o.order_date DESC, o.ord_seq ASC, o.ord_proc_seq ASC
SELECT order_id, ord_seq, ord_proc_seq, claim_id, member_id, order_date, total_amount, status FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, ord_seq ASC, ord_proc_seq ASC
